headline: Why Tutor Perini (TPC) Is Up 6.5% After Record Backlog and Higher-Margin Contract Wins – And What's Next
summary: Recently, analysts highlighted Tutor Perini’s improved profitability outlook as the company converted a growing pipeline of higher-margin work and secured two new contracts worth over US$260 million, lifting its project backlog to a record US$21.60 billion. This combination of backlog expansion and confidence in turning that work into higher-margin revenue has strengthened perceptions of Tutor Perini’s long-term revenue visibility and earnings potential. Next, we’ll examine how this record...

headline: Is It Too Late To Consider Tutor Perini (TPC) After A 196% One-Year Rally?
summary: If you are wondering whether Tutor Perini shares still offer value after a big run, this article walks through what the current price might mean for potential investors. The stock last closed at US$75.09, with returns of 6.5% over 7 days, 13.7% over 30 days, 8.3% year to date and 195.9% over 1 year. The 3 year return is very large at roughly 7x, and the 5 year return also stands out. Recent coverage has focused on Tutor Perini as a major player in large construction and civil infrastructure...
